item.title: CVE-2024-49313|2024-10-17T18:35:03.110Z -- rudestan -- vkontakte%20wall%20post
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in RudeStan VKontakte Wall Post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects VKontakte Wall Post: from n/a through 2.0.
